mapper.insert: insert into upp_user ( user_id, user_name, user_password, user_desc ) values ( #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_password}, #{user_desc jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select a.user_id, a.user_name, a.user_password, a.user_desc from upp_user a where a.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update upp_user a set a.user_name = #{user_name}, a.user_password = #{user_password}, a.user_desc = #{user_desc} where a.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete from upp_user a where a.user_id = #{user_id}
